summary: This is just a small edit to the Nordic bow and Arrows
descriptionHtml:
This is my first try at making a mod. Since I have been on the nexus for a few years I always wanted to contribute something to the community. So here it is for thoes of us that really like the nordic bow (like my self) I made a few small edits to the damage and speed of the Nordic Bow and the Nordic Arrows.

Nordic Bow---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Vanilla:

Damage>> 13
Speed>> .687

Redone:

Damage>> 36
Speed>> .800

Nordic Arrows >>>>--------------------------------------<>

Vanilla:

Damage>> 14

Redone:

Damage>> 22
============================================================================================

Requirements: Dragonborn DLC.

Uninstall>> Disable NordicBow&Arrow.esp and delete and done!

If you don't like it>> Then uninstall and thanks for giving my mod a chance :P
author: Wolfdie88
